title: Please help 6.24 patch
body: When I launch the client it gives says there is a problem with your connection, if you are  not currently connected to the Internet,  please do so. If you are already online but cannot connect to league of legends, check hours support page to find possible solutions. Then you give me two options the restart or shut down please help!!!!!

replies.body: There were [server issues](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/yjteaUkU-login-issues-all-regions-127) last night preventing some players from logging in.  Everything is okay now!  Are you still having any issues?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OREtrEgu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-08T19:35:22.217+0000)
>
> There were [server issues](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/yjteaUkU-login-issues-all-regions-127) last night preventing some players from logging in.  Everything is okay now!  Are you still having any issues?

Yes I'm still having issues

Thanks for the follow-up!  In your case, there may be a network problem that's blocking you from reaching the login servers.  I recommend going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OREtrEgu,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-08T23:19:12.689+0000)
>
> Thanks for the follow-up!  In your case, there may be a network problem that's blocking you from reaching the login servers.  I recommend going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I actually tried everything it said and nothing seems to work my game was fine until I tried to download the most recent patch

Thanks for trying!  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to us so our tech team can help individually with your connection problem.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) if possible and attach logs to your ticket for more context.  We'll respond as soon as we can!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OREtrEgu,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-09T00:01:42.349+0000)
>

I uninstalled the game and tried to install it again but now I can't launch the league launcher it simply closes soon after I try to open it
